short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reminds you to take eye rest breaks every 20 minutes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protect your eyes and improve your productivity with the 20-20-20 Eye Care Reminder extension! Our extension helps you follow the 20-20-20 rule, which is designed to reduce digital eye strain. Every 20 minutes, you'll receive a friendly pop-up reminder to look at something 20 feet away for 20 seconds. It's a simple yet effective way to maintain healthy vision and keep your eyes feeling fresh throughout the day.
